room_title: Escape room "Minervaâ€™s Return" by Decode Detroit in Ann Arbor
review: This was our third escape room and it was incredibly fun. Two in our group had done Part 1, so we did Part 3 and it was no trouble even for those of us who hadn't done the beginning. There was something for everyone to do, including our 12-year-old, and the puzzles were challenging - it took a real team effort. I would definitely recommend this experience to anyone!
